title: Direction magnetic force particle moving to wire

content.description: A particle of charge +q and mass m moves toward a long wire that carries a current I. At the instant shown above, the particle is a distance r from the wire and is moving perpendicularly toward the wire with speed v. There is a magnetic force on the particle as a result of the current.
content.question: What is the direction of the magnetic force on the particle at the instant shown?

choices.label: Out of the plane of the page
Into the plane of the page
